unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever Grips Nation!**
normalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Film Fest Fever Grips Nation!**

unnormalised: Hey folks, your friendly neighbourhood cinephile here, reporting live from the world of celluloid dreams! Film festival season is officially ON, and the vibes are totally lit.
normalised: Hey folks, your friendly neighborhood cinephile here, reporting live from the world of celluloid dreams! Film festival season is officially on, and the vibes are totally lit.

unnormalised: From the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK), showcasing some seriously thought-provoking cinema, to smaller, more intimate fests popping up in cities like Pune and Chennai, there's a movie for every mood.
normalised: From the International Film Festival of Kerala (I F F K), showcasing some seriously thought-provoking cinema, to smaller, more intimate fests popping up in cities like Pune and Chennai, there's a movie for every mood.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that many screenings are packed, so book your tickets early! Talking about IFFK, rumour has it, some attendees are even carrying Onam Sadhya leftovers to enjoy during intermissions. Now that's dedication!
normalised: Word on the street is that many screenings are packed, so book your tickets early! Talking about I F F K, rumor has it, some attendees are even carrying Onam Sadhya leftovers to enjoy during intermissions. Now that's dedication!

unnormalised: We've seen a surge in independent filmmakers showcasing their talent, a refreshing change from the usual Bollywood masala. Expect to see some future Anurag Kashyaps and Zoya Akhtars emerging from these events. Plus, the post-screening discussions are where the real magic happens – heated debates over chai and samosas!
normalised: We've seen a surge in independent filmmakers showcasing their talent, a refreshing change from the usual Bollywood masala. Expect to see some future Anurag Kashyaps and Zoya Akhtars emerging from these events. Plus, the post-screening discussions are where the real magic happens – heated debates over chai and samosas!

unnormalised: Keep an eye out for the awards season too, folks. These festivals can really launch careers. Who knows, maybe next year, we'll be writing about *your* film!
normalised: Keep an eye out for the awards season too, folks. These festivals can really launch careers. Who knows, maybe next year, we'll be writing about *your* film!
